What time is it better to drink coffee so he doesn't break his mental state and sleep?

  • 15 Jan 2024
  • Editorial
  • 17
  • Leave a comment.

If a combination of already high cortisol levels with extra coffee effects can trigger an undesirable organism response to stress. This reaction can be mitigated if we wait about an hour before we have a morning coffee.
